hero.title: About Tikko
hero.subtitle: We're on a mission to transform how people discover, attend, and create memorable experiences through events that bring communities together.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2024, Tikko emerged from a simple observation: finding and attending great events was unnecessarily complicated. We believed there had to be a better way to connect people with experiences that matter to them.
story.paragraph2: Our platform combines cutting-edge technology with human-centered design to make event discovery and ticketing a simple and intuitive experience, from intimate workshops to large festivals.
story.paragraph3: But we're more than just a ticketing platform. We're building a community of passionate event-goers, creative organizers, and innovative venues who believe that shared experiences are what make life memorable.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We prioritize building meaningful connections and fostering vibrant communities through shared experiences.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries to create better, smarter solutions for event discovery and management.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We're genuinely passionate about events and the magic they create in people's lives.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We're committed to delivering exceptional experiences for both organizers and attendees.

cta.title: Join Our Journey
cta.subtitle: Be part of a community that's redefining how people experience events.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Our team is here to help make your event experience amazing.

info.title: Contact Information
info.subtitle: Reach out through any of these channels and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

auth.INVALID_REQUEST: Unable to complete sign in. Please try again.
auth.MISSING_CODE: Authentication code is missing. Please try signing in again.
auth.MISSING_CODE_VERIFIER: Authentication verification failed. Please try signing in again.
auth.UNSUPPORTED_IDENTITY_PROVIDER: This sign-in method is not supported. Please use a different method.

auth.AUTH_METHOD_FACEBOOK: This account is registered with Facebook. Please sign in with Facebook.
auth.AUTH_METHOD_APPLE: This account is registered with Apple. Please sign in with Apple.
auth.OAUTH_EXCHANGE_FAILED: Unable to complete sign in with this provider. Please try again.
auth.MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS: Please fill in all required fields (email, username, and password).
auth.MISSING_VERIFY_FIELDS: Please provide both email and verification code.
auth.MISSING_LOGIN_FIELDS: Please provide both email and password.
auth.WEAK_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 8 characters and include: uppercase letter, lowercase letter, number, and special character.
auth.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in instead.
auth.INVALID_CREDENTIALS: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
auth.EMAIL_NOT_VERIFIED: Please verify your email before signing in. Check your inbox for the verification code.
auth.PASSWORD_NOT_SET: Please sign up first to create your account and set a password.
auth.PASSWORD_RESET_RATE_LIMITED: Please wait {{minutes}} minutes before requesting another password reset.
auth.TOO_MANY_PASSWORD_RESET_ATTEMPTS: Too many password reset attempts. Please try again in {{hours}} hours.
auth.EXPIRED_RESET_TOKEN: Password reset link has expired. Please request a new one
auth.USED_RESET_TOKEN: This password reset link has already been used. Please request a new one
auth.MISSING_RESET_FIELDS: Password reset token or new password is missing
auth.TOO_MANY_REGENERATION_ATTEMPTS: Too many code regeneration attempts. Please try again later
auth.REGENERATION_RATE_LIMITED: Please wait {{minutes}} minutes before requesting another code
auth.MISSING_REFRESH_TOKEN: Session expired. Please sign in again.
auth.INVALID_REFRESH_TOKEN: Your session has expired. Please sign in again.
auth.INVALID_VERIFICATION_CODE: The verification code is incorrect. Please check and try again.
auth.NO_VERIFICATION_RECORD: No verification found for this email. Please sign up first.
auth.VERIFICATION_EXPIRED: This verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.VERIFICATION_ALREADY_USED: This verification code has already been used.
auth.TOO_MANY_VERIFICATION_ATTEMPTS: Too many verification attempts. Please request a new code.
